vlive.korean: 시원해 시원해 - 자극적으로 아프거나 그렇진 않죠? So cool. - It isn't irritating or so? 듣기 View video SmileJ : SUB) 남자친구랑 간단하게 블랙헤드 없애는법 (코 블랙헤드 빼기) Black head remover⎮ 미소정
vlive.english: So cool. - It isn't irritating or so?

vlive.korean: 사실 그렇진 않아요. But that's not the case. 듣기 View video Wanna One : 관린이 심심하다😎
아니요, 저는... - 막 그렇진 않아요 - 그렇진 않죠? No... - No. - You can't see it? 듣기 View video CLC : CLC, 걸크러시 끝판왕 소환!!
vlive.english: No... - No. - You can't see it?

vlive.korean: 그렇진 않더라고요 - 여기 높이가 몇 m 정도 되는 거예요? I wasn't relaxed. - How tall is this? 듣기 View video Golden Child : 골든차일드(Golden Child) ‘골차의 휴일 2’ #3
vlive.english: I wasn't relaxed. - How tall is this?

vlive.korean: 일단은 전혀 효과가 없을 것인가 그렇진 않을 거 같습니다. I wouldn't say they are not at all ineffective. 듣기 View video WIWO : MY Special night care routine!!! what is your special care??
vlive.english: I wouldn't say they are not at all ineffective.

examples.korean: ‘Did you enjoy the book?’ ‘Not really’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그 책 재미있었니?” “꼭 그렇진 않았어.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
